about_the_game:
Prologue:
-Jack Argyle, a skilled contractor, arrives at Phorcys Station accompanied by his trusty robotic assistant. Their objective: repair the station's malfunctioning communications system and return home. What should be a straightforward job becomes twisted when they're confronted by the dangers aboard the station.

Setting:
-Set in the same world as Test of Courage and Born Into Fear, carefully navigate the underwater ex-Aegis facility, Phorcys Station, in the near future of the year 2043 while you attempt to restore its communications.

Gameplay:
-Piece together the fragments of the station's history and uncover the truth behind its troubled past through dialogue, terminal entries, and more while you attempt to accomplish your mission.
-Overall, the gameplay combines atmospheric exploration, survival elements, and an engaging narrative to provide a thrilling and immersive experience within the haunted depths of Phorcys Station.

- Repair control panels to restore access to locations around Phorcys Station.

- Meet some of the colorful souls who lived in Phorcys Station.

- Learn about the past lives of the Children of Joy through their personal computer terminals.

Features:

- Visions: Get a glimpse of something otherworldly happening in the station.

- Variety of characters: Speak to various NPC's and avoid the failed experiments of the Ambassador.

- Randomized solutions: Each console will have a different solution for everyone.

- Drone Companion: Your constant companion throughout the game, Robuddy will speak to you and give you advice on your quest. He’ll also serve as your flashlight and can highlight interactable objects/objectives using Enlightened Vision.

Can you bring the Children of Joy the peace they seek?

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3200G; Intel I3-9100F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio

short_description: As Jack Argyle, you are tasked with restoring communication at the underwater ex-Aegis facility known as Phorcys Station. Be careful, or risk joining the spirits trapped inside.
